export const OrgOptions=[
    {value:"Hardware"},
    {value:"Software"},
    {value:"Services"}
]
export const StatusOptions=[
    {value:"Demo"},
    {value:"Helpdesk"},
    {value:"IT department"}
]
export const BussinessCriticalOptions=[
    {value:"Demo"},
    {value:"Helpdesk"},
    {value:"IT department"}
]
export const StorageOptions=[
    {value:"256 GB"},
    {value:"512 GB"},
    {value:"1 TB"},
    {value:"10 TB"},
    {value:"20 TB"},
]
export const locationData=[
    {value:"Abu Dhabi"},
    {value:"Ajman"},
    {value:"Al Ain"},
    {value:"Dubai"},
    {value:"Fujairah"},
    {value:"Ras Al Khaimah"},
    {value:"Sharjah"},
    {value:"Umm Al Quwain"},
]
export const storageType = [
    {value:"SSD"},
    {value:"HDD"},

]
export const OperatingSystem = [
    {value:"Windows Operating System"},
    {value:"Linux Operating System"},

]

export const VirtualizationPlatform = [
    {value:"VMware"},
    {value:"Hyper-v"},
    {value:"Virtual Box"},

]
export const ServerType = [
    {value:"Physical Server"},
    {value:"Virtual Server"},
    {value:"Web Server"},
    {value:"Database Server"},

]
export const OwnerData = [
    {value:"System Administrator"},
    {value:"Developer"},
    {value:"Devops Engineer"},
    {value:"Network Administrator"},

]
export const ServerManufacturerData = [
    {value:"Hewlett Packard Enterprise"},
    {value:"Lenovo"},
    {value:"Dell Technologies"},
    {value:"Cisco"},

]

export const NetworkDeviceType = [
    {value:"Router"},
    {value:"Switch"},
    {value:"Firewall"},
    {value:"Access Point"},
]


export const storageDevices = [
    { value: "Hard Disk Drive (HDD)" },
    { value: "Solid State Drive (SSD)" },
    { value: "USB Flash Drive" },
    { value: "Secure Digital (SD) Card" },
    { value: "CompactFlash (CF) Card" },
    { value: "Optical Disc (CD/DVD/Blu-ray)" },
    { value: "Network Attached Storage (NAS)" },
    { value: "Cloud Storage" },
    { value: "Magnetic Tape" },
    { value: "Hybrid Drive (SSHD)" }
]


export const storageDeviceManufacturers = [
    { value: "Seagate" },
    { value: "Western Digital" },
    { value: "Samsung" },
    { value: "Toshiba" },
    { value: "Kingston" },
    { value: "SanDisk" },
    { value: "Intel" },
    { value: "Crucial" },
    { value: "ADATA" },
    { value: "Transcend" }
]


export const storageInterface = [
    { value: "SATA" },
    { value: "SAS" },
    { value: "NVMe" },
    { value: "PCIe" },
    { value: "USB" },
    { value: "Thunderbolt" },
    { value: "eSATA" },
    { value: "FireWire" },
    { value: "Ethernet" },
    { value: "Fiber Channel" }
]

export const storageFileSystem = [
    { value: "NTFS" },
    { value: "FAT32" },
    { value: "exFAT" },
    { value: "HFS+" },
    { value: "APFS" },
    { value: "EXT4" },
    { value: "Btrfs" },
    { value: "ZFS" },
    { value: "XFS" },
    { value: "ReFS" }
]

export const partitionStyle = [
    {value:"MBR"},
    {value:"GPT"}
]











 {/* <ContentDevider title={`${serviceType} General Information`}/>
        <CmdbGridContainer MenuItems={[OrgOptions,ServerData]} show={[true,true,false,false]} name={Field1} dropdown={[false,true]} selectValue={Type} setSelectValue={setType} setName1={setServerName} ManufacturerData BussinessCriticalOptions/>
        <CmdbGridContainer MenuItems={[ManufacturerData,BussinessCriticalOptions]} show={[true,true,false,false]} name={Field2} setSelectValue={setManufacturer} setName2={setModel}  dropdown={[true,false]} />
        <CmdbGridContainer MenuItems={[locationData,BussinessCriticalOptions]} show={[true,true,false,false]} name={Field3} dropdown={[true,false]} setName2={setSerialNumber} selectValue={Location} setSelectValue={setLocation}/> */}
